==== Notes ====

Suspend to ram resume has blank monitor.  Ctl+alt+f1 and the Fn+F5 (Display switch) until back to console, then Ctl+alt+F7/8 fixes this.  I think there's an option to do this automagically in /etc/default so I have to fiddle.

* Contact: JonathanLozinski
* Make: Toshiba
* Model: Satellite 1410 (UK, S1410-704)

=== Current Issues ===
* Infrared is not properly detected.
* boot waits for 2/3 mins at "Staring Ubuntu..." before any action, on both boot and resume from hibernate.
* trackpad does not scroll as in windows
